creditline: The James S. Bell Memorial Fund
description:
Rare George II Two-handled Cup and Cover.
cup has number partially rubbed off
inscription:
Mark and Inscription

Within applied cartouche on front, a coat of arms (unidentified) and on back another with crest of a horse\'s head couped.
markings:
Mark and Inscription

Fully marked on underside of foot and on bezel of cover.
title: Two-handled cup with cover
